name: 2nd Edition of World Congress on Geology & Earth Science
content: After the success of Geoscience-2019 conference held in London, Innovinc International proudly announcing the “2nd Edition of World Congress on Geology & Earth Science” (GeoEarth-2020) which will be held in Osaka, Japan from July 9-11, 2020\. GeoEarth-2020 welcomes colleagues from all branches of Geosciences and to disseminate their valuable work.
